name: Rodsteven's Adventure
description:
Rodsteven's Adventure First Anniversary! 

  • New map! Rod is now in an Island. Can you believe it? 
  • There's no only one island, there are a lot of big candies in there. (Mini spoiler: You can travel there with a portal) 
  • New Power, now you can put a little power to improve your outfit. 
  • New Minigame, do you ever thought to fly in the sky with an amazing Backpack?!

Other: 

  • The Settings Menu is fixed, now you can change the quality. 
  • Fixed some mini bugs. 
  • Enjoy this special event with Rod!

You can download here too!

Rodsteven's Adeventure Page

Download Rodsteven's Adventure Halloween Edition, it will end in 1 day!
